title: Great app!
comment: I'm in love with the quotes from Civ, so this is great to have on a homescreen; integrates well with DashClock as well. Needs some proofreading however.

title: Does not appear, suggestions...
comment: Doesn't appear on my Nexus 7 with Nova launcher (Kit Kat). You should make a widget...  Still, it's a really good idea.
